feeling all better and ready to play again .
output.sentences: The little boy was playing in the yard one day.
Suddenly, he fell and got a booboo.
He ran to his daddy, who tried to make him feel better.
His dad set him down, and the little boy ran off.
When the boy came back outside, he was ready to play with his new favorite ball because he was feeling better.
